alert.note: Alert for Halifax (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 4:36PM EDT until May 06 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Halifax County in central North Carolina... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 434 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Rich Square, moving northeast at 40 mph. Additionally, another strong to severe storm has moved into the warning area and it too will have the potential to produce severe weather. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scotland Neck and Tillery. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central North Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
